TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISmartTagExtension implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.IExtension

summary.span: 表示使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具自定义的 Excel 工作表中的智能标记的扩展。

span.span: Represents an extension of a smart tag in an Excel worksheet that is customized by using Office development tools in Visual Studio.

summary.span: 此扩展为智能标记定义自定义识别器。

span.span: The extension defines a custom recognizer for the smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口如果你想要控制 Excel 如何识别在工作表中的智能标记。Implement the interface if you want to control how Excel recognizes smart tags in worksheets. ## 用法Usage 此类型旨在用于 Excel 2007 仅在项目中。This type is intended to be used only in projects for Excel 2007. Excel 2010 中已弃用智能标记。Smart tags are deprecated in Excel 2010. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现创建你自己的智能标记识别器。The following code example demonstrates how to implement to create your own smart tag recognizer. 该示例实现方法以识别每个智能标记术语找到在单元格中。The example implements the method to recognize each smart tag term found in a cell. 此示例假定你已添加到的引用**Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag**从 **.NET**选项卡**添加引用**对话框。This example assumes that you have added a reference to **Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag** from the **.NET** tab of the **Add Reference** dialog box. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/CS/CustomSmartTag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/VB/CustomSmartTag.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Recognize (string text, Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite site, Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList tokenList, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext context);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Recognize(string text, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite site, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList tokenList, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext context) cil managed

param.name: text
param.span: 要在其中搜索识别术语的文本。

span.span: The text to search for recognized terms.

param.name: site
param.span: 工作簿或文档中的文本位置。

span.span: The location of the text in the workbook or document.

param.name: tokenList
param.span: 要在其中搜索识别术语的文本，分为一系列令牌。

span.span: The text to search for recognized terms, broken down into a list of tokens.

param.name: context
param.span: 一个提供发送到识别器的单元格文本的对象，以及一种可调用以指示找到的智能标记的方法。

span.span: An object that provides the text from the cell that is sent to the recognizer and a method you can call to indicate that the smart tag was found.

Docs.summary:
在单元格文本中搜索识别的术语。
Searches text in the cell for recognized terms. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]要识别出的词汇搜索文本。This method is called by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] to search text for recognized terms. 如果你想要合并你自己的搜索算法来运行此外到标准识别器，则实现此方法。Implement this method if you want to incorporate your own search algorithms to run in addition to the standard recognizers. 若要查看示例代码，请参见本主题的 Microsoft Visual Studio 2008/.NET Framework 3.5 版。To view a code example, see the Microsoft Visual Studio 2008/.NET Framework 3.5 version of this topic.
